name: demonetize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
ECONOMICS, FINANCE to officially stop using particular notes or coins, or a particular currency: In 2002 the currencies of twelve European countries were demonetized and replaced with the Euro.
demonetization noun [ U ] (UK also demonetisation)
This is a reminder about the imminent demonetization of the RM1000 currency notes.
